LanguageData.SoED_GoldWaste.label: Smelt the gold into pieces.
LanguageData.SoED_GoldWaste.description: Divide the golden unit of measure into pieces for the craft.
LanguageData.SoED_MakeGoldOfGoldWaste.label: Smelt gold from gold pieces.
LanguageData.SoED_GoldLeaf.label: Roll out the gold leaf.
LanguageData.SoED_GoldLeaf.description: Stretches golden pieces to gold leaf.
LanguageData.SoED_GoldLeafB.label: Roll out the gold leaf. x25
LanguageData.SoED_GoldLeafB.description: Stretches golden pieces to gold leaf.
LanguageData.SoED_GoldLeafC.label: Roll out the gold leaf. x75
LanguageData.SoED_GoldLeafC.description: Stretches golden pieces to gold leaf.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSandstoneGilded.label: Gild sandstone
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSandstoneGilded.description: Apply gilding to material blocks. Makes material flammable.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksGraniteGilded.label: Gild granite
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksGraniteGilded.description: Apply gilding to material blocks. Makes material flammable.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksLimestoneGilded.label: Gild limestone
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksLimestoneGilded.description: Apply gilding to material blocks. Makes material flammable.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSlateGilded.label: Gild slate
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSlateGilded.description: Apply gilding to material blocks. Makes material flammable.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksMarbleGildedd.label: Gild marble
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksMarbleGildedd.description: Apply gilding to material blocks. Makes material flammable.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSandstoneGildedToGoldWaste.de: Collect gilding from blocks of stone, sacrificing stones in order to collect every grain of precious metal
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksGraniteGildedToGoldWaste.desc: Collect gilding from blocks of stone, sacrificing stones in order to collect every grain of precious metal
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksLimestoneGildedToGoldWaste.de: Collect gilding from blocks of stone, sacrificing stones in order to collect every grain of precious metal
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSlateGildedToGoldWaste.label: Collect gilding from slate
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSlateGildedToGoldWaste.descri: Collect gilding from blocks of stone, sacrificing stones in order to collect every grain of precious metal
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksMarbleGildedToGoldWaste.label: Collect gilding from marble
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksMarbleGildedToGoldWaste.descr: Collect gilding from blocks of stone, sacrificing stones in order to collect every grain of precious metal
LanguageData.SoED_GildingMetal.label: Apply gold to iron
LanguageData.SoED_GildingMetal.description: Apply gold to iron. The material remains the same in quality, but it is more pleasant to look at.
LanguageData.SoED_GildingMetalToGoldWaste.label: Remove gilding from iron
LanguageData.SoED_GildingMetalToGoldWaste.description: Remove gilding from iron, without worrying about the safety of the material. After all, it's all about keeping the gold.
LanguageData.SoED_GoldJawInstall.label: instal golden dentures
LanguageData.SoED_RemoveGoldJaw.label: remove grillz
